comment: Cats are the best pets because they can purr
Cats are the worst pets because they are so independent, it's like they manipulate and barely tolerate you instead of wanting to be with you
Dogs are the best pets because they can be trained to do all sorts of stuff, including help and defend
Dogs are the worst pets because they're meant to be wild and free, not domesticated
I don't have pets, but I really enjoy all the birds singing beautiful varied melodies outside my window
